channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC

item.description:
Report E-2023100922

  • City: DILLON
  • State: SC

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UPON ARRIVAL AT CONSIGNEE FACILITY DRIVER DISCOVERED PRODUCT HAD BEEN RELEASED FROM DOME COVER DURING TRANSIT. INSPECTION SHOWED GASKET FAILED ALLOWING PRODUCT RELEASE. RELEASED CLEANED UP BY CONSIGNEE PLANT PERSONNEL. UNLOADING COMPLETED WITHOUT ADDITIONAL INCIDENT.

item.title: Report X-2023100342
item.description:
Report X-2023100342

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the Damaged Hazmat cage. It had been placed in a hazmat bag and in a hazmat tote. Outer package was wet. DescribePack: The caps on both bottles were loose and product leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag and tote. Placed in damaged hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023100322
item.description:
Report X-2023100322

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: LEXINGTON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damaged package was discovered by the unload manager. The manager alerted the senior admin on duty and then the admin in question placed the damaged package into a lined hazmat bin. The package was then transported to the hazmat cage for further processing. DescribePack: There was no seal under the lid of the damaged bottle and the cap was loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023100309
item.description:
Report X-2023100309

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: MYRTLE BEACH
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was improperly loaded causing the seal to rupture. Package was placed in a red hazardous tote with lining. DescribePack: The seal was broken after being improperly loaded. The location of the hole is on the top of the seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was immediately put into the tote.
